title: Set alias for columns in data set but in expression builder still shows the old columns name when selecting the dataset
description: When setting an alias for columns in a dataset, the expression builder still displays the old column names instead of the aliases.
OB: When selecting the dataset in the expression builder, the old column names are displayed instead of the aliases set for the columns.
EB: The expression builder should display the aliases set for the columns in the dataset, instead of the old column names.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a new datasource and a dataset. 2. Set an alias for the first column in the dataset as 'column1'. 3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset. 4. Select the dataset in the expression builder and observe that the old column name is displayed instead of the alias.
